name: Vivnnae
passiveDesc: Triggering Spread reactions accumulates 2 Echo Memory for Vivnnae.
rTalentDesc: Vivnnae's Normal and Charged Attacks accumulate 1 Echo Memory and 5 Energy. Dealing Disorder DMG accumulates 10 Energy.
normalAttackDesc: Vivnnae deals 88 (+33% Physical ATK) as Physical DMG to the opponent.
chargedAttackDesc: Vivnnae deals 122 (+58% Physical ATK) as Physical DMG to the opponent.
normalSkillName: Normal Skill - Feather Hopes and Dreams
normalSkillDesc:
Vivnnae casts a "Feather of Hopes" to the opponent, dealing 11 (+36% Magic PWR) as Magic DMG.

[4EM] Vivnnae casts a "Feather of Hopes" to the opponent, dealing 63 (+87% Magic PWR) as Gale DMG, returning "Flower of Dreams" to her, healing herself by 104% of the DMG dealt.

[6EM] Vivnnae casts a "Feather of Hopes" to the opponent, dealing 114 (+101% Magic PWR) as Gale DMG, returning "Flower of Dreams" to all team members, healing them by 104 (+242% of the DMG dealt) (+112% Magic PWR).

[10EM] When Vivnnae has over 10 Echo Memory, she'll enters Meditating state. Meditating state: Vivnnae gains 40% All Disorder RES and consumes 3 Echo Memories each round, healing all team members except her by 88 (+143% Magic PWR). During this state, Vivnnae cannot casts any other skills. state ends when all Echo Memories are consumed.
riftedSkillDesc: Vivnnae casts a Feather Field for 2 Cycles. Feather Field: Increases all team members Physical ATK by 64% of Vivnnae's Magic PWR, max 600, and heals all team members by 66 (+119% Magic PWR) each Cycle.
fragment1Desc: Energy Efficiency is increased by 20%. When casting "Lightest Decision", Vivnnae gains 4 Echo Memories.
fragment2Desc: Vivnnae's gains 40% Gale DMG Bonus. If Vivnnae is in the team, Spread Reaction DMG is increased by 20%.
fragment3Desc: "Feather of Hopes and Dreams" level is increased by 3.
fragment4Desc: During Feather Field, all opponent's Gale RES is decreased by 40%.
fragment6Desc: During Feather Field, all team members All Disorder RES is increased by 20%.
